Title: Relates to requiring a school bus attendant on all school buses
Summary: Requires a school bus attendant on all school buses transporting students in kindergarten through sixth grade to or from school or from any school related activity.
LawCode: Amd ยง1229-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring a school bus attendant on all school buses
